Hoboken.Winston Preparatory School:
The Winston Preparatory School  is a co-ed school for students with learning disabilities (such as dyslexia, ADHD, and NVLD) in grades 4-12. The school has campuses in New York City, Norwalk, Connecticut, and Whippany, NJ. The organization also operates a post-secondary "Transitions" in New York City.

Winston Preparatory School is chartered by the State of New York and is a member of ISAAGNY, NYSAIS, NEASC, and NAIS. The New York School is accredited by NYSAIS and NEASC. The organization also has a research and public outreach division called the "Winston Innovation Lab".
